properties.name: Bleu
properties.description: Posted by Datashaman 921 SW Morrison Street, portland, orExcellent five course meals at 5 for lunch and 5 for dinner. Cooked and served by students from the Western Culinary Institute. Not open during school holidays. 503-294-9770

properties.name: Bob's Red Mill Natural Foods
properties.description: Posted by Datashaman5209 SE International Way, Milwaukie, OR 97222Bob\'s Red Mill Natural Foods produces more than 400 products, including a full line of certified gluten free products and an extensive line of certified organic products. With a wide variety of whole grain products, from flours and hot cereals to baking mixes and grains, Bob’s Red Mill has “whole grain foods for every meal of the day.”

properties.name: Delta Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Datashaman  4607 Southeast Woodstock Boulevard, Portland, OR, 97206Delta Cafe 503-771-3101

properties.name: Doris Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Datashaman  3606 N Williams Ave, Portland, OrBack in the mid-90s, Doris Cafe was good southern food. The last few times that I went (around 2002), it was pretty marginal, frozen/canned tasting vegetables. And it became expensive (>0 for lunch). According to some articles that I\'ve read, it was closed in 2004 because of a rental dispute. Now, it seems to be open again at a new location. I\'m willing to try it one more time to see if they have rediscovered the magic.

properties.name: Hillsdale Brewery & Public House
properties.description: Posted by Datashaman 1505 Southwest Sunset Boulevard, Portland, OR, 97239A McMenamins restaurant. Can\'t say much more about it. Just like the other 10,000 McMenamins in Portland. 503-246-3938

properties.name: Porterhouse Restaurant & Lounge
properties.description: Posted by Datashaman 14611 SE McLoughlin Blvd, portland, orThis place blows. Seriously, the server was bad, the steaks were half fat and grissle. Don\'t waste your time or money.

properties.name: Ringside Steakhouse
properties.description: Posted by Datashaman 14021 NE Glisan St, portland, orGreat steakhouse in NE Portland. Located next to a golf course. Easier to get into than the downtown Ringside. Casual. Good food. Old staff. 503-255-0750
